notes: can mean a Spaniard or the Spanish language; masculine dictionary form; starts with s+consonant so uses ''lo/uno/gli''
example_sentence_english: I speak Spanish.
I know a Spaniard.

notes: also used to mean 'the Spanish language'
example_sentence_italian: Lo spagnolo è una lingua romanza.
example_sentence_english: Spanish is a Romance language.

example_sentence_italian: Ho visto una spagnola al mercato.
example_sentence_english: I saw a Spanish woman at the market.
I spoke with a Spanish woman.

example_sentence_italian: La spagnola ha lasciato un messaggio.
example_sentence_english: The Spanish woman left a message.
Famous Spaniards live here.
The Spaniards are friendly.
I know some Spaniards at work.
The Spanish women sang.
The Spanish women are here.

example_sentence_italian: Ho visto delle spagnole al festival.
example_sentence_english: I saw some Spanish women at the festival.
The accent of Spanish is clear.
I spoke to the Spaniard.
I returned from the Spaniard yesterday.

example_sentence_italian: Nello spagnolo ci sono vari dialetti.
example_sentence_english: In Spanish there are various dialects.

example_sentence_italian: Ho letto un articolo sullo spagnolo.
example_sentence_english: I read an article about Spanish.
I walked with the Spaniard.

example_sentence_italian: Il racconto della spagnola è interessante.
example_sentence_english: The account of the Spanish woman is interesting.
I spoke to the Spanish woman.

example_sentence_italian: Ho ricevuto una lettera dalla spagnola.
example_sentence_english: I received a letter from the Spanish woman.

example_sentence_italian: Nella spagnola si notano differenze regionali.
example_sentence_english: In Spanish (feminine reference) you notice regional differences.

example_sentence_italian: Ho letto un libro sulla spagnola.
example_sentence_english: I read a book about the Spanish woman.
I had lunch with the Spanish woman.

example_sentence_italian: Parlo degli spagnoli che ho incontrato.
example_sentence_english: I talk about the Spaniards I met.
We must call the Spaniards.
I received help from the Spaniards.

example_sentence_italian: Negli spagnoli si trovano diverse usanze.
example_sentence_english: Among Spaniards there are different customs.
I found information about the Spaniards.
I had dinner with the Spaniards.
I talk about the Spanish women in the group.
I called the Spanish women.
I had news from the Spanish women.

example_sentence_italian: Nelle spagnole si notano influenze locali.
example_sentence_english: Among Spanish women you notice local influences.
I read articles about the Spanish women.
I travelled with the Spanish women.
